General.Name: Goldlok Toys Holdings Guangdong Co Ltd
General.Description: Goldlok Holdings(Guangdong) Co.,Ltd. engages in the toys and Internet education businesses in China. Its products include electric trains, interactive sparring robots, electric vehicles, wire-controlled simulation aircraft, smart dolls, and environmentally friendly magnets, as well as Learning writing boards, plush toys, educational toys, intelligent interactive toys, IP image authorized toys, gifts, etc. The company is also involved in trading business. It offers its products to the United States, Latin America, European Union, Asia, Hong Kong, and other Asian regions. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Puning, China. Goldlok Holdings(Guangdong) Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Xingchang Plastics Hardware Factory Co., Ltd.
